name: DENTAL_VISIT_INFO_HX
description: The DENTAL_VISIT_INFO_HX table contains the edit history of a dental visit record.

columns.name: REGIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the visit record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VISIT_MOD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the visit was modified.

columns.name: VISIT_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record that modified data for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_MOD_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: VISIT_LINKED_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: TREATMENT_HX_ID
columns.description: The revision history of the treatment ID containing the visit.

columns.name: VISIT_SPAC_DAYS_HX
columns.description: The revision history of the requested spacing, in days, for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_SCHED_INST_HX
columns.description: The revision history of the scheduling instructions for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_APPT_LEN_HX
columns.description: The revision history of the requested appointment length for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_APPT_HX
columns.description: The revision history of the appointment linked to a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_NUMBER_HX
columns.description: The revision history of a visit's order within a dental treatment.

columns.name: VISIT_CHRON_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This column records the date and time of a documentation change to the dental visit within the dental treatment plan.

columns.name: DENT_SCH_STAT_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Audit trail for dental scheduling status

columns.name: DENT_REQ_DATE_HX_DATE
columns.description: Audit trail for Requested Date to Schedule

columns.name: DENT_VIS_TYPE_HX_ID
columns.description: Audit trail for a visit's requested visit type for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VIS_DEPT_HX_ID
columns.description: Audit trail for a visit's requested department for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VIS_PROV_HX_ID
columns.description: Audit trail for a visit's requested provider for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VIS_PTYPE_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Audit trail for a visit's requested provider type for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VIS_STAT_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Dental visit status audit item

columns.name: VISIT_NAME_HX
columns.description: The historical name of the dental visit.

columns.name: RFL_ORDER_HX_ID
columns.description: History of linked referral orders for a dental visit.

columns.name: DENT_RDY_SCHED_HX_YN
columns.description: Audit trail for ready for scheduling flag.
